text: Fernando Guillén Cuervo (born March 11, 1963) is a Spanish actor, film director and scriptwriter. His parents are Fernando Guillén and Gemma Cuervo, and his sisters are Cayetana, and Natalia. All are actors. He wrote the script of Bulgarian Lovers and worked as a direction assistant in Año mariano. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
